title: Samsung rolls out May 2022 security patches early for the Galaxy Tab S8 series
content:
When it comes to pushing monthly security updates, Samsung has set the benchmark high for other Android OEMs. The company’s update schedule has improved to the extent that itâ€™s now pushing the latest Android security patches to some of its devices even before Google officially publishes the corresponding Android Security Bulletin. The post Samsung rolls out May 2022 security patches early for the Galaxy Tab S8 series appeared first on XDA.
description: Samsung has already started rolling out May 2022 security patches to the Galaxy Tab S8 family across the globe. Read on to know more!
